titles: A pair of snowy owls spotted along Lake Michigan beach draws crowds in Chicago
A pair of snowy owls spotted along Lake Michigan beach draws crowds in Chicago - AP News
summary: Two snowy owls have been spotted along a Lake Michigan beach in Chicago, attracting large crowds of birdwatchers and residents. The presence of these Arctic birds is unusual for the area and has generated significant local interest. The owls remain in the area, but it is unclear how long they will stay.
